resources.string: This activity shows the list of artists, albums and playlist. When the user searches for a song,playlist or artist list below will populate as the letters are typed.
This activity shows the playing song and artist details. Controls for the song will be included at the bottom of the screen, below the buttons.
This activity shows the details of a selected song or artist. There will be a need to receive information pertaining to the selected song in either the Now Playing activity or Song List Activity.
This activity allows you to buy songs and provide payment options
